messages.title: Dear Voter
messages.content: A general election has been called and I seek your support to be your MP. I have been an MEP for London since 2004. I have a track record of fighting for things that matter to you. I hope to represent you in Parliament and continue this work.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Find the money by leaving the EU and slashing foreign aid.
Reduce and control mass immigration; Create an immigration system that treats all people equally.
Increase spending on The Police and Armed Forces.
An astronomically costly white elephant nobody needs.
Something unwanted by a majority of local residents.
Institute a yearly national day for all, defend free speech and free press.

issues.brexitEurope: Brexit Must Not Be Betrayed! | Brexit Must Mean Exit!
issues.health: Spend more on the NHS: Find the money by leaving the EU and slashing foreign aid.
issues.immigration: Reduce and control mass immigration; Create an immigration system that treats all people equally.
issues.transport: Scrap HS2: An astronomically costly white elephant nobody needs. | Oppose the Heathrow third runway: Something unwanted by a majority of local residents.

community.content: Immigration: Reduce and control mass immigration; Create an immigration system that treats all people equally.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have been an MEP for London since 2004. I have a track record of fighting for things that matter to you. I hope to represent you in Parliament and continue this work.

examples: Oppose the Heathrow third runway: Something unwanted by a majority of local residents.
Spend more on the NHS: Find the money by leaving the EU and slashing foreign aid.
Immigration: Reduce and control mass immigration; Create an immigration system that treats all people equally.
Make Britain more secure: Increase spending on The Police and Armed Forces.
Scrap HS2: An astronomically costly white elephant nobody needs.
Protect British culture: Institute a yearly national day for all, defend free speech and free press.
Brexit Must Not Be Betrayed! | Brexit Must Mean Exit!
Oppose the Heathrow third runway: Something unwanted by a majority of local residents.
Scrap HS2: An astronomically costly white elephant nobody needs.
